price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߕߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߕߏߢߊ ߞߊ߲߬ ߊ߬ ߞߎߡߊ߫ ߞߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߟߊ߫߸ ߤߟߴߊ߬ ߜߏߦߊ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߛߐ߲߬ߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayuḥiqqu al-lahu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
